features: 【Monitor Stand for 2 Monitors】This stand is an ideal choice when you need computers to work together. Unique original design products,this dual-monitor stand features a sturdy construction black with a rustic brown wood finish for an added rustic and unique look.

【Heavy Duty Stand for Computer】Monitor riser is designed with thick solid steel legs, its bearing load is very strong. With anti-slip pads installed on the bottom of the monitor, stable monitor stands without any sliding, you can choose whether to install.

【Multifunctional Monitor Riser 】The monitor stand has powerful storage function of keeping the table clean.It can be used as a monitor stand riser, printer stand, laptop riser, or a TV stand, makeup, animals. Extra storage space underneath organize your office supplies.

【Protect Your Eyes and Neck Health】The ideal ergonomic design is adopted in this unit and has easier operation, you can raise your computer screen to a comfortable sight level, reduce the risk of neck and eye-straining while providing a better viewing experience.

【Easy to Assemble】The board and frame of this monitor stand riser come with pre-drilled holes and all tools, parts and detailed instructions are included in the package, making it very easy to install. Just follow the instructions step by step and every person can do it in 2 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Straightforward, appealing and useful stand
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this choice to raise my monitors on my desk.Appearance-------------The stand looks nice. The brown faux-wood is very classy and the ebony black is modern, though the two together is a little bit weird. It looks very nice and matches my ebony black desk pretty well. It stands up on black feet and generally the whole stand is low profile. Again, love how classy it looks.Space-------------The stand is thin but long. This allows me to fit a 27' and a 24' monitor, though I did have to place them both at a tilt and the stands of my 27' monitor is just ever-so-slightly off of the stand. But it's in no way at risk of falling. It provides ample space if you have one monitor and plenty to spare. Two monitors like myself and you have to play a bit to get them to fit, but they'll fit. It also has good gaps for little stuff I always have at my computer.Setup-------------Straightforward directions, though I wasn't familiar with the turning screws that come included. Easy to get the pieces together -- took me about 15 minutes, and I'm slow at building.Overall------------Great expansion stand for adding deskspace and improving posture. Helps me not bend my neck down and sit straighter. I'd recommend the stand 100%. It's a 10/10 for the quality-price value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product at great value
reviews.reviewText: Colors look great, easy to assemble, and stable. Dimensions are just right. Full recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this purchase. This was fairly easy to put together, is sturdy, aesthetically pleasing, and puts things I need at the perfect height. It's also the perfect height for a laptop or desktop computer. If you need to be staring at a screen all day (particularly if you're having any kind of on-camera virtual calls) you really need to have your computer at an ergonomical height. This is exactly what you want. And then it gives you some space to put things under it as well, which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Stand, minus one minor issue
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR - It is a great unit! Cut the four (4) supplied rubber pads in half to have enough to hit all the supports. Otherwise, center support will sag.Pros: Decided on this stand because it comes with a center vertical support most others do not. The stand is very sturdy and easy to assemble. It perfectly matches the wood look desk I ordered from a different vendor. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a wider vertical riser. I am currently using it with two 24" monitors and there is plenty of room for them in horizontal configuration side by side.Cons: The only issue I have with the unit is they pack it with four (4) rubber pads. I placed them at the four corners of the outside supports, per the instructions. There were none supplied for the center support (which again, was the main reason I bought this particular unit was because it had the center support to prevent bowing). As it sits now with the rubbers pads installed, the foot of the center support sits about an 1/8th of an inch higher than the outside supports, which causes the center to bow with weight on it. I am going to the store to buy some extra pads and that will easily resolve the issue, but if I had known better at the time, simply cutting the supplied pads in half will give you plenty of pads to attach and alleviate the issue. There was nothing in the instructions mentioning this, but it would be my recommendation for anyone considering this unit. It was the only reason I deducted a star. If you are not planning to use the rubber pads, this is a non-issue.Note to manufacturer: The two remedies to this situation would be to: A. Include 2 extra pads so all contact points are covered with full size pads, or B. Write in the instructions to cut the 4 pads in half, thereby creating enough pads for the whole unit without adding extra pads/cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This monitor stand is good quality.
reviews.reviewText: The stand arrived in just a few days. It was easy to assemble and came with extra hardware just in case. The wood is heavy and appears to be solid wood vs composite. It freed up a lot of desk space. The height is just right for working comfortably from home. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and great looking!
reviews.reviewText: It may take you an hour or so to put it together, but it is well worth the time. It is well thought out and everything seems to fit nicely. Do not be tempted to use glue simply because at the end you may want to tap it a few times to let it settle into place. and you don’t need glue. It is a gorgeous unit and helps you get rid of all that clutter plus make room for your keyboard if you want to push it out of the way. I plan on purchasing another. WWW.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this when I got my new monitor (its pretty long). If it was an average monitor, you could definitely put speakers beside it or whatever you desire of course. It's not too high or too low, it's perfect.It was super easy to put together and it hold nicely. Design is simple and great. I like placing stuff under and over it, plenty of room for my Xbox and its games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and looks nice. Fairly easy to put together if you're good with that stuff. Has a piece of wood underneath to support the middle that prevents a keyboard from fitting underneath all the way if you want to store your keyboard.If you don't want to stash your keyboard underneath it then it's perfect.
Exactly what I was looking for, very study for my curved monitor. Not many sellers have such a wide monitor stand. Highly recommend
